transcript:
morning Kutuzov seemed worn and irritable. The infantry pass- ing before him came to a halt without any command being given, apparently obstructed by something in front. 
"Do order them to form into battalion col- umns and go round the villagel" he said angri- ly to a general who had ridden up. "Don't you understand, your excellency, my dear sir, that you must not defile through narrow village streets when we are marching against the ene- my?" 
"I intended to re-form them beyond the vil- lage
